posts.title: A React Component to connect with MetaMask
posts.excerpt: In this post, we are going to build a React button able to connect with a Metamask Wallet, and read the wallet's selected address.

posts.title: Announcing MakerKit - A SaaS starter for Next.js and Firebase
posts.excerpt: MakerKit is a SaaS starter for Next.js, Firebase, and Tailwind CSS. It comes with authentication, organizations, payments with Stripe, a blog and documentation generators, and much more.

posts.title: A Scalable Project Structure for Next.js
posts.excerpt: Next.js and React are not opinionated. Much is left to us to figure out - and without rules, our code can get wild pretty quickly. In this post I explain the rationale behind the way I structure my Next.js projects for small and medium-sized apps

posts.title: Generating automatic banners for your Blog
posts.excerpt: Say no to custom banners. This post will teach you how to generate automatic banners for your articles using Next.js, SVG and Sharp
